Notes
  • Unreal Engine 4 Blackjack rules are used by this game.
  • Unreal Engine 4 Blackjack does not support split or insurance.
  • Unreal Engine 4 Blackjack rules are not standard. Please let me know in the comments any rules you find that are not standard. 
  • I plan to do another version with standard blackjack rules in the future.

Technical
  • Unreal Engine Version 4.23
Design
  • My goal for this game was to convert the UE4 Blackjack game from fixed 3D to a movable 3D user interface.
  • The cards scale is larger than the mannequin. I decided to increase the player scale; however, having two different scales causes problems so I would prefer to decrease the card scale to the same scale as the mannequin in a future version.
Feedback

Install Instructions

Download the ZIP file, unzip, and run the EXE file. No install is required.
